testcase.name: test_email_invoice_without_api_key
testcase.failure: tests/test_p1_p2_features.py:311: in test_email_invoice_without_api_key assert create_response.status_code == 201, f"Failed to create invoice: {create_response.text}" E AssertionError: Failed to create invoice: {"detail":[{"type":"missing","loc":["body","amount"],"msg":"Field required","input":{"customer_name":"Test Customer","customer_phone":"+919876543210","job_card_id":"698f9f0ac18c7ff6345f7a7e","items":[{"description":"Test Service","quantity":1,"unit_price":1000,"gst_rate":18,"hsn_sac_code":"998711","total_amount":1180}],"total_taxable_value":1000,"cgst":90,"sgst":90,"igst":0,"total_amount":1180,"status":"Draft"},"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/missing"}]} E assert 422 == 201 E + where 422 = <Response [422]>.status_code

testcase.name: test_email_invoice_invalid_id
